, do I need to wait for all the Super validators be in the latest release, to upgrade our validator to the latest release as well?

text: I'm looking at <https://sync.global/sv-network/>

elements.text: I'm looking at

text: 2/3 is enough

elements.text: 2/3 is enough

text:
Once 2/3 adopt, that means it's not going to be reverted or skipped due to an issue.

But you can adopt now if you want, and just accept the (small) operational risk that you might be told that more than 1/3 of the SVs don't trust it for some reason.

That scenario is more likely on DevNet than on MainNet, so the chances of it rolling back are pretty minimal, just not zero.

elements.text:

But you can adopt now if you want, and just accept the (small) operational risk that you might be told that more than 1/3 of the SVs don't trust it for some reason.

That scenario is more likely on DevNet than on MainNet, so the chances of it rolling back are pretty minimal, just not zero.
